name: Error Management
description:
Fend off errors in this VR arcade-style shooter.

Taking inspiration from old Source engine jank, Error Management is an arcade-style shooter tasking the player to shoot errors for as long as possible.

Error Management supports all major PCVR headsets. Quest 2 Standalone support is planned but not actively being worked on.

This game was made over a month as my first attempt at VR game development. I have documented a process in a youtube video that you can watch here.
